marklogic.body: Here is my little description of iShazz and her day. She is probably somewhat corpulent with a dash of bad Body odor. The Body odor probably comes from a lack of ability to Reach certain areas of her body when bathing. She spends her day eating large amounts of food, the kind with a lot of fat. Then she waddles to her computer and start typing with her fat little fingers . . .Â Why bother going on with description? It's too depressing. Why do you bother, iShazz?
